info.title: PageSpeed
info.description: Integrate PageSpeed performance analysis into your development workflow.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to fetch and analyze.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale used to localize formatted results.

parameters.name: rule
parameters.description: A Page Speed rule to run; if none are given, all rules are run.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.description: Returns response with identations and line breaks.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.description: IP address of the site where the request originates.

get.description: Runs Page Speed analysis on the page at the specified URL, and returns a Page Speed score, a list of suggestions to make that page faster, and other information.

info.title: PageSpeed
info.description: Integrate PageSpeed performance analysis into your development workflow.
